article.title: Aquilino Assigned to Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

tags.tag: Office of the Chief of Naval Operations

article.text: Rear Adm. John C. Aquilino, USN, has been appointed to the rank of vice admiral and assigned as deputy chief of naval operations for operations, plans, and strategy, N-3/N-5, Office of the Chief of Naval Operations, Pentagon, Washington, D.C.Â
